import React, {Component} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; // import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; class Service extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { services : [] } } componentDidMount(){ axios.get('http://localhost/service') .then(res => { this.setState({ services : res.data.result }) }) } render(){ const {services} = this.state; const listService = services.map((srv) =>

{srv.serviceName}
